name: Untitled Demo (Zeppelin Games)
description:
Untitled is a puzzle game that takes place in a dystopian future science lab. Genetic modification of humans has developed to the point where clone replication has been created. Clones are exploited to discover the limits of the human body. 
You play as a telekinetic user within the lab under the watchful eye of the AI. Solve puzzles using your abilities to appease the AI and win your freedom. 

*THIS GAME IS STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT AND IS NOT COMPLETE*
This current version is a demo of the full game as it is still being developed. There are multiple bugs that I am aware of and am working toward fixing, but please let me know of any issues you encounter during gameplay. Currently, there are about 5 minutes of gameplay time. The settings option still hasn't been implemented.
